no.ntnu.okse.protocol

Interface ProtocolServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProtocolServer, WSNotificationServer

    public interface ProtocolServer
    Created by Aleksander Skraastad (myth) on 3/13/15.

    okse is licenced under the MIT licence.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void boot()
      This interface method must implement a complete initialization and startup process of a protocol server.
      java.lang.String getProtocolServerType()
      This interface method must return a string with the name of the protocol for which the protocol server is responsible for handling.
      int getTotalBadRequests()
      This interface method must return the total amount of bad requests recieved by the protocol server.
      int getTotalErrors()
      This interface method must return the total amount of errors generated by the protocol server.
      int getTotalMessages()
      This interface method must return the total amount of messages that has been processed by the protocol server.
      int getTotalRequests()
      This interface method must return the total amount of requests the protocol server has handled.
      void stopServer()
      This interface method must implement a complete shutdown procedure of the protocol server.

    • Method Detail

      • getTotalRequests

        int getTotalRequests()
        This interface method must return the total amount of requests the protocol server has handled.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the total amount of requests handled.

      • getTotalMessages

        int getTotalMessages()
        This interface method must return the total amount of messages that has been processed by the protocol server.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the total amount of processed messages.

      • getTotalBadRequests

        int getTotalBadRequests()
        This interface method must return the total amount of bad requests recieved by the protocol server.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the total amount of recieved malformed or bad requests

      • getTotalErrors

        int getTotalErrors()
        This interface method must return the total amount of errors generated by the protocol server.
        Returns:
        An integer representing the total amount of errors in the protocol server.

      • boot

        void boot()
        This interface method must implement a complete initialization and startup process of a protocol server. As it is used in the Core Service to fire up all registered protocol servers upon application start.

      • stopServer

        void stopServer()
        This interface method must implement a complete shutdown procedure of the protocol server.

      • getProtocolServerType

        java.lang.String getProtocolServerType()
        This interface method must return a string with the name of the protocol for which the protocol server is responsible for handling.
        Returns:
        A string representing the name of the protocol in question.
